def_en: If you inherit money or property, you receive it from someone who has died.

def_cn: (从前人、前任等)接过,得到
def_en: If you inherit something such as a task, problem, or attitude, you get it from the people who used to have it, for example because you have taken over their job or been influenced by them.

def_cn: 经遗传获得(特征、特质等)
def_en: If you inherit a characteristic or quality, you are born with it, because your parents or ancestors also had it.
